RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOMESTIC PRODUCT chased just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, took over command at the three-eighths, swung three then two wide roused into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to prevail. STURDY broke in at the start bumping MIDDLE MARKET in concert with GOLDEN PLATE, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one, offered up a mild bid to secure the place honors. ELIMINATE chased along the inside until tipped three wide through the far turn, got placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. BOUNTEOUS coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, yielded the front under coaxing three furlongs from home, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. DANGEROUS DRIVER coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, tired. SHAMROCK SHAKE chased three wide coaxed along from the three-eighths and tired in the stretch. MIDDLE MARKET got bumped between foes at the start who each broke his way, chased three wide coaxed along from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, tired. GOLDEN PLATE broke out at the start bumping MIDDLE MARKET, raced two to three wide through the first turn growing rank and unsettled and tossing his head against the reserve hold of the rider possibly resenting the kickback, continued rank into the backstretch to five furlongs out when tipped four wide in more of the clear to the outside made a mild advance and came under coaxing tucked three wide through the far turn, went four to five wide into upper stretch having spent most energy fighting his rider and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Eliminate
ENTRY.OWNER: Spendthrift Farm LLC and Repole Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3w 5/16, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Sturdy
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no match, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Domestic Product
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, up 3/8, 3-2w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Middle Market
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped betw st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bounteous
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, yielded coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dangerous Driver
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Shamrock Shake
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Plate
ENTRY.OWNER: Fern Circle Stables and Gainesway Stable (Antony Beck)
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 2-3w 1st turn, rank unsettled, 4-5w uppr, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 87. Waiver Claiming Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $32,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allo wances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EVERYONELOVESLINDA established the front and showed the way just off the inside down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, shied out under a left side crop and was corrected at the three-sixteenths, dug in under threat from a pair holding stubborn sway, came out slightly with seventy yards from the finish and held on to prevail. ROYAL MEGHAN chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, rallied and was forced to go outwards as DAME CINCO drifted out under a left handed crop a furlong out, dug in steadily closing on the leader and just missed at the end. DAME CINCO broke out a step at the start, chased four then three wide before tucking to the two path midway on the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in and drifted out a furlong out two paths carrying out ROYAL MEGHAN, ran on to the finish paused briefly late as EVERYONELOVESLINDA tightened up the seam between foes in the final strides. I'M BUZZY chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. TO A T chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, offered no response. HYDRA chased five then four wide, came under coaxing briefly three wide at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dame Cinco
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J and Koshanostra Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out step st, chased 4-3w, 4w upper, drifted out 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Meghan
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8,4-5w uppr, floated out 1/8, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Everyoneloveslinda
ENTRY.OWNER: Rudina Stable and K Five Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, 2w 1/4, shied 3/16, stubbornly, held on

ENTRY.NAME: To a T
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, angled 4-5w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Buzzy
ENTRY.OWNER: Two B and One C Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Hydra
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3w 5/16, angled 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 1/8M Turf CR: 88. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; O lder, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track.) (Rail a t 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SNOWY EVENING just off the inside tracking from mid pack, came under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a sixteenth from home, edged away to the finish kept to task. OVERACTING just off the pace three wide in pursuit, got let out swinging four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, got collared a sixteenth out and ran on willingly to secure the place honors. BERNT AGAIN chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. SMOKIE EYES chased along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, weakened in the late stages. SALS DREAM GIRL settled just off the inside at the tail of the field and was forced to check off the heels of a rival into the first turn, chased two then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung seven wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. STELLA MARS chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. LADY JASMINE coaxed from the gate, attended the leader from the outside in the two path coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take narrow and brief command a furlong out before being displaced from the front, then weakened to the finish. MONROE coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, got collared near the eighth pole, then got steadied when backing away inside that station before weakening to the end. CRIMSON PRINCESS four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the stretch. RUSSIARUSSIARUSSIA chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths and weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Russiarussiarussia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Smokie Eyes
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing Bilinski Darlene and Rocco Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, bid 1/8, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Snowy Evening
ENTRY.OWNER: Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Gleaves Philip A
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, set down 4w upper, up 1/16, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Monroe
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrell Ventures LLC and Seaside Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, ins 1/4, collared 1/8, steady, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasmine
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Behrendt John T Marquis Charles K Haslup Suzanne K Carney Sean Punk
ENTRY.COMMENT: coax st, attended 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4, up 1/8, yielded, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Bernt Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, angled 5-6w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Sals Dream Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p at rear, check off heels 6 1/2, coax 3w 3/8, 7w uppr, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Overacting
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 3w, 4w upper, up ins 1/8, collared 1/16, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Stella Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Princess
ENTRY.OWNER: Robin Lane Thoroughbreds LLC and Englehart Jeremiah C
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 3w 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 6F Outer turf CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 1 22 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim W ill Be Void). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLUID SITUATION showed the way in hand four then three wide shaking away through the turn, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat, got collared near the sixteenth marker and fought on inside to the wire. LEGENDS CAN'T DIE pressed the pace along the inside early on and then chased just off the inside through the turn, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a sixteenths from home, dug in head to head battling game to the finish. VACATION DANCE chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. RUN CURTIS RUN coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. CHEWING GUM chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. COMEDY TOWN chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. NOLO CONTESTO chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. CHESS MASTER chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide for home, weakened in the stretch. CAZADERO chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered no response. SOUZAK (FR) chased three wide coaxed along from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4, mild bid

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed ins early, chased 2p turn, 3w upper, up 1/16, game

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Chess Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 4-3w, shook away, inside 1/4, collared, fought on

ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable Wachtel Stable and Zaro Jerold L
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, mild bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At TimeO f Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSTIN BAY rushed the stall door and beat the gate before the latch was sprung, chased four then three wide in closest aim of the leader, advanced to take command near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside at that station, edged away under a drive to prevail. SWEET WILLEMINA chased three wide until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. TONED UP chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. FROSTY O TOOLE chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. MISSY GREER showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, yielded the front and took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened in the stretch. ALLAMERICANBEAUTY five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide for home and weakened. PRETTI XTREME chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, tired. FIRST TO ACT chased along the inside and then just off the inside, got placed to a protective hold when backing away midway on the turn, got directed outwards and was eased through to the sixteenth marker when pulled up and escorted by outrider, then walked off under her own power. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into the start focusing on BUSTIN BAY. After review it was determined that BUSTIN BAY had broke through the gate just prior to the latch being sprung and therefore BUSTIN BAY was disqualified from first and unplaced prior to the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Willemina
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed ins 5/16, 3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, improved

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, yielded, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5-6w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Bustin Bay

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Chelsey Flower S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 94. Stakes Purse 135000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $135 each which should accompany the nomination; $675 to pass the entry box and an additional $675 to start. For ho rses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $675 In addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to thir d, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance allowed 2 lbs.; all maidens allowed 4 lbs. Preference to start will be determined by Graded Stake winners, Graded stake placed runners, non-restricted stake winners, total earnings. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. C
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIVING MAGIC just off the inside tracking in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong taking command seventy yards from home, then edged away to the finish to prevail. OZARA (IRE) tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, dug in and was caught seventy yards from the finish, ran on to preserve the place honors. GOLD LIGHTNING chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. LATTE LIZZIE chased along the inside until tipped three wide through the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. AWESOME CZECH chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, made no headway. FLOWERS FOR ME chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered no response. CYNANE chased just off the inside, came under coaxing three to four wide at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened. RED BURGUNDY established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared nearing the eighth pole, then weakened through to the finish. TRICKY TEMPER two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, offered no kick. GAVEA (GER) chased three wide through the first turn before chasing three then two wide losing ground and contact with the field into the far turn, continued to grow detached at the tail of the field and went five wide into upper stretch and was eased home through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Burgundy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand inside, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, collared, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, dug in, up fin 70yds, edged cl

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3-4w 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Gavea (GER)

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Athenia S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/8M Outer turf CR: 107. Stakes Purse 150000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and a n additional $750 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of thew inner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Three year olds, 122 lbs. Older 126 lbs. Weight: Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake on the turf in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake o n the turf in 2023 or two races on the turf other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance in 2023 allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race too
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TECHNICAL ANALYSIS (IRE) established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside, got roused spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive twice making the rail a bit tight for the runner up while holding well to the finish. BEAUTE CACHEE (FR) tracked the pace along the inside, got let out taking the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive pausing when placed in a bit tight briefly at the eighth pole and seventy yards from the finish, ran on willingly for the place honors. FLUFFY SOCKS saved ground near the rear of the field, got set down angled just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. SPARKLE BLUE saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. FAVOR settled just off the inside just off the pace, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. UNCORKED (AUS) tracked the leader just off the inside in closest aim, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, weakened. EVIDENCIAS (BRZ) saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, came up empty. EIGHT DANZAS chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Bold Ruler S. - Grade3 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 108. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $200 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,000 to sta rt. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $1,000 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing time of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% tot hird, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights: Three year olds, 122 lbs. Older 125 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstakes other than state-bred in 2023 allowed 4 l bs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, October 14, 2023 with 22 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DURANTE hustled from the gate, showed the way in hand four paths off the inside, tucked to the two path and then inside through the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and was roused straightened away, drew clear under a drive to prevail. HIGH OAK broke in at the start, chased seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. TWISTED RIDE coaxed from the gate, chased six then five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to the finish. STAGE LEFT chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and kept on to the end. COWAN six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three to four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide for home and weakened. FIVE DREAMS coaxed from the gate, chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn and into upper stretch, tipped out four to five paths near the three-sixteenths and offered no rally. JEFF FA FA took the overland route eight to nine paths off the inside down the backstretch and then five wide through the turn, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact. PROVOCATEUR forwardly placed five paths off the inside in aim of the leader, tucked three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, cornered three wide into upper stretch and faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Stage Left
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, angled 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Durante
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, in hand 4p, inside turn, 2w 1/4p, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Provocateur
ENTRY.OWNER: McMahon Joseph G McMahon Anne and McMahon Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 5p, 3-2w turn, 3w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Cowan
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 3-4w turn, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the S tewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAKE CELEBRITY tracked two to three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch taking over command straightened away, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to the finish. BETTRLUCKYTHANGOOD tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, closed well to secure the place honors. SLAPINTHEFACE just off the inside in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. DOMINATION broke a half a beat slow, chased just off the inside from near the rear of the field, got set down angled two to three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. DOLLY'S BANK two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, kept on under a drive to the finish but was outfinished. EGYPTIAN QUEST chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, offered no response. MUGSY FURY established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch under threat and yielded the front straightened away, then weakened in the final furlong. CLEVER FOREVER two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, had no rally. TONY O three wide through the first turn, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. KID KREESA stumbled badly at the start belly flopping before recovering his legs under him while conceding four to five lengths to the front, chased just off the inside through the first turn before tipping three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch, steadily lost ground detached at the tail of the field, went five to six wide into upper stretch well behind and was eased along to the finish, then walked off under his own power.

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Fury
ENTRY.OWNER: Furey III Charles and Davis Marguerite
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand inside, coaxed near 1/4, inside 1/4, yielded, weakened
